hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) forbade the offering of two prayers: -1. after the morning prayer till the sunrises. -2. after the `Asr prayer till the sun sets

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَتَحَرَّى الصَّلاَةَ قَبْلَ غُرُوبِ الشَّمْسِ
chapter.eng-name: One should not try to offer As-Salat (the prayers) just before sunset
